claim: David Thewlis was snubbed for the Best Actor award at Cannes Film Festival.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Other notable performances include the films Naked  (  for which he won the Best Actor award at Cannes Film Festival  )  , Dragonheart , Kingdom of Heaven , The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas , The Theory of Everything , Black Beauty , and Macbeth  (  in which he played King Duncan  )  .

claim: David Thewlis was snubbed for the Best Actor award at Cannes Film Festival.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has also won a Best Actor Award of the Cannes Film Festival for the Nick Cassavetes-directed She 's So Lovely  (  1997  )  , and two Best Actor Awards at the Venice Film Festival for the indie film Hurlyburly  (  1998  )  and the drama 21 Grams  (  2003  )  .
